methods.name: WithModuleSize
methods.summary: Sets the module size in pixels.

methods.name: WithQuietZone
methods.summary: Sets the quiet zone size in modules.

methods.name: WithBackgroundSupersample
methods.summary: Sets the background supersample factor (1 = disabled).

methods.name: WithForegroundPaletteZones
methods.summary: Sets palette overrides for specific zones.

methods.name: WithModuleCornerRadiusPx
methods.summary: Sets the module corner radius in pixels.

methods.name: WithPngCompressionLevel
methods.summary: Sets the PNG compression level (0 = stored/uncompressed, 1-9 = compressed).

properties.name: ModuleSize
properties.summary: Gets or sets the size of a single QR module in pixels.

properties.name: QuietZone
properties.summary: Gets or sets the quiet zone size in modules.

properties.name: Foreground
properties.summary: Gets or sets the foreground (dark) color.

properties.name: Background
properties.summary: Gets or sets the background (light) color.

properties.name: BackgroundGradient
properties.summary: Optional gradient for the background.

properties.name: BackgroundPattern
properties.summary: Optional pattern overlay for the QR background area.

properties.name: BackgroundSupersample
properties.summary: Background supersample factor for gradients/patterns (1 = disabled, max 4).

properties.name: ForegroundGradient
properties.summary: Optional gradient for the foreground (dark) modules.

properties.name: ForegroundPalette
properties.summary: Optional multi-color palette for foreground modules.

properties.name: ForegroundPattern
properties.summary: Optional pattern overlay for foreground modules.

properties.name: ForegroundPaletteZones
properties.summary: Optional palette overrides for specific zones.

properties.name: Eyes
properties.summary: Optional eye (finder) styling overrides.

properties.name: ModuleShape
properties.summary: Gets or sets the module shape.

properties.name: ModuleScale
properties.summary: Gets or sets the scale of the module inside its cell (0.1..1.0).

properties.name: ModuleScaleMap
properties.summary: Optional per-module scale mapping.

properties.name: ModuleShapeMap
properties.summary: Optional per-module shape mapping.

properties.name: ModuleJitter
properties.summary: Optional per-module jitter (organic placement).

properties.name: ProtectFunctionalPatterns
properties.summary: When true, keeps non-eye functional patterns (timing/alignment/format/version/dark module) at full scale and a stable foreground color for scan reliability.

properties.name: ProtectQuietZone
properties.summary: When true and a background pattern is enabled, skips drawing the pattern inside the quiet zone.

properties.name: ModuleCornerRadiusPx
properties.summary: Gets or sets the corner radius in pixels for .

properties.name: Logo
properties.summary: Optional logo overlay (centered).

properties.name: Canvas
properties.summary: Optional canvas options for sticker-style output.

properties.name: Debug
properties.summary: Optional debug overlay options.

properties.name: PngCompressionLevel
properties.summary: PNG compression level (0 = stored/uncompressed, 1-9 = compressed).

fields.name: BackgroundSupersampleMax
fields.summary: Maximum allowed background supersample factor (capped to avoid large memory spikes).
